statements: SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_country = 'USA' AND project_country = 'Brazil'
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY project_name
SELECT donor_name, donor_country FROM donations ORDER BY donor_country DESC, donor_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE project_name = 'Education Fund' AND donor_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, project_name, donor_country, project_country FROM donations WHERE donor_country != project_country AND donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS average_donation FROM donations WHERE project_name = 'Healthcare Project';
SELECT donor_name, project_name, donor_country FROM donations ORDER BY project_country, donor_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, country FROM donors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors ORDER BY donor_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, amount FROM projects WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, country FROM projects ORDER BY country ASC, project_name DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT project_name, amount FROM projects WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, country FROM donors JOIN projects ON donors.country = projects.country;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM donors JOIN projects ON donors.country = projects.country GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE amount > 10000 AND country = 'Germany';
SELECT * FROM Donor;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM Donor ORDER BY donor_id DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_country FROM Donor WHERE donor_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE project_country = 'Canada';
SELECT project_name, project_country FROM Project ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Donor WHERE donor_country = 'USA';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM Donor JOIN Donation ON Donor.donor_id = Donation.donor_id WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT Donor.donor_name, Project.project_name FROM Donation JOIN Donor ON Donation.donor_id = Donor.donor_id JOIN Project ON Donation.project_id = Project.project_id;
SELECT project_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM Donation JOIN Project ON Donation.project_id = Project.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT donor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM Donation JOIN Donor ON Donation.donor_id = Donor.donor_id GROUP BY donor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT donor_name, donor_id FROM donors;
SELECT project_name FROM projects WHERE country='USA';
SELECT project_id, project_name, country FROM projects WHERE country='Canada';
SELECT donor_name, amount, currency FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_id FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id
SELECT project_name, country FROM projects ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, project_name, amount, currency FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id JOIN projects ON donations.project_id = projects.project_id
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 AND currency = 'USD'
SELECT projects.project_id, project_name, country_name FROM projects JOIN countries ON projects.country = countries.country_name
SELECT * FROM Donor;
SELECT donor_name, country FROM Donor WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, country FROM Donor ORDER BY donor_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, estimated_cost FROM Project WHERE estimated_cost > 10000;
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, project_id, amount FROM Donation WHERE donation_date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT donor_name, country FROM Donor;
SELECT project_id, project_name, estimated_cost FROM Project WHERE estimated_cost > 10000;
SELECT d.donor_name, p.project_name, c.currency_name FROM Donation AS d JOIN Project AS p ON d.project_id = p.project_id JOIN Currency AS c ON p.country = c.currency_code;
SELECT * FROM Donation WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT d.donor_name, dl.location_name, dl.city, dl.country FROM Donor AS d JOIN DonorLocation AS dl ON d.donor_id = dl.donor_id;
